1.title: Chapter Thirty-Six: Labor Day
1.plot: As the jury begins deliberations in his murder trial, Archie makes a surprising request; Jughead leads the Serpents against the Ghoulies latest attack.

2.title: Chapter Thirty-Seven: Fortune and Men's Eyes
2.plot: After a gruesome discovery is made in the forest, Jughead and Betty team up to investigate; Archie navigates his new surroundings.

3.title: Chapter Thirty-Eight: As Above, So Below
3.plot: Suspicious roadblocks threaten to delay the opening of the speakeasy; Betty and Jughead follow different leads; Archie is forced to make a difficult decision.

4.title: Chapter Thirty-Nine: The Midnight Club
4.plot: Alice revisits her disturbing ties to Gryphons and Gargoyles, a game she and the other parents played in high school.

5.title: Chapter Forty: The Great Escape
5.plot: Veronica recruits the gang for a high-stakes mission; Archie makes a renegade plan; Jughead rolls the dice on a new psychological theory.

6.title: Chapter Forty-One: Manhunter
6.plot: Betty follows some strong leads; Veronica uncovers a crucial piece of evidence; Archie struggles with a devastating decision.

7.title: Chapter Forty-Two: The Man in Black
7.plot: Archie hits the road and ends up at a farm; Betty finds herself up against a formidable foe from her past; Veronica makes a risky business decision.

8.title: Chapter Forty-Three: Outbreak
8.plot: After a shocking event rocks the Riverdale Vixens, Veronica stages a confrontation; Betty enlists an unlikely ally; Jughead reconnects with his past.

9.title: Chapter Forty-Four: No Exit
9.plot: In the aftermath of Hiram's takeover, Veronica leads the charge against him; Betty hosts a group of desperate visitors; Archie faces his demons.

10.title: Chapter Forty-Five: The Stranger
10.plot: With SATs around the corner, Betty comes face-to-face with someone from her past; Jughead makes a bold move against the Gargoyle Gang.

11.title: Chapter Forty-Six: The Red Dahlia
11.plot: Betty investigates a string of suicides; Jughead comes face-to-face with Hiram's alleged mistress; Archie spirals out of control.

12.title: Chapter Forty-Seven: Bizarrodale
12.plot: An unsettling message forces "The Midnight Club" to reunite; Veronica and Reggie resort to desperate measures; Kevin gives Moose an ultimatum.

13.title: Chapter Forty-Eight: Requiem For A Welterweight
13.plot: Archie steps back into the ring; Alice goes deeper with the Farm; Jughead visits the Heart of Darkness; Veronica juggles dueling villains.

14.title: Chapter Forty-Nine: Fire Walk with Me
14.plot: When the Farm sets their sights on someone in her inner circle, Betty takes matter into her own hands; Veronica sets a plan to turn the tables on Hiram and Gladys in motion; Jughead struggles to maintain control over the Serpents.

15.title: Chapter Fifty: FIFTY
15.plot:

16.title: Chapter Fifty-One: Big Fun
16.plot: The teens at riverdale high perform a musical of the production "Heathers" with Cheryl, Betty, Veronica, and Josie as the leads.

1.title: Chapter One: The River's Edge
1.plot: As a new school year begins, the town still reels from Jason Blossom's tragic death; Archie decides to pursue a career in music; Cheryl Blossom stirs up trouble.

2.title: Chapter Two: A Touch of Evil
2.plot: Archie pleads with Ms Grundy to come forward with what they heard; Cheryl deals with the pressure of Jason's death; Jughead stumbles upon Archie's secret.

3.title: Chapter Three: Body Double
3.plot: Cheryl comes clean about when she last saw Jason; Betty and Jughead investigate Jason's death; Veronica and Ethel investigate a shame book.

4.title: Chapter Four: The Last Picture Show
4.plot: Jughead fights to keep the local drive-in open; Betty and Veronica investigate Ms Grundy, uncovering some startling information about her past.

5.title: Chapter Five: Heart of Darkness
5.plot: The Blossom family move forward with Jason's funeral, and a secret agenda; Hermione seeks Fred's help; Betty dives deeper into Jason's death.

6.title: Chapter Six: Faster, Pussycats! Kill! Kill!
6.plot: Valerie's efforts to help Archie leads to a major fallout with Josie; Betty and Jughead's investigation brings them face-to-face with Polly.

7.title: Chapter Seven: In a Lonely Place
7.plot: New rumors swirl when a major piece of evidence is mysteriously destroyed; Cheryl approaches Betty with an unexpected proposal.

8.title: Chapter Eight: The Outsiders
8.plot: Archie and his friends pitch in to help Fred, but when one of them is attacked, they come up with a plan that lands them in Southside Serpent territory.

9.title: Chapter Nine: La Grande Illusion
9.plot: Archie receives an offer from Cheryl; Veronica befriends a classmate that her father's illegal doings has hurt; Alice prepares for revenge on the Blossoms.

10.title: Chapter Ten: The Lost Weekend
10.plot: Fred decides to finalize his divorce; Archie plans to win Valerie back; Betty plans a surprise birthday party for Jughead, until Cheryl spirals things out of control.

11.title: Chapter Eleven: To Riverdale and Back Again
11.plot: Cheryl and Polly decide to attend the Homecoming in Jason's honor, until a revelation waylays their plans; Alice turns to Archie and Veronica for help.

12.title: Chapter Twelve: Anatomy of a Murder
12.plot: Archie and Veronica are shocked to learn of the arrest, and must come clean to their parents about what they uncovered; Jason's killer is revealed.

13.title: Chapter Thirteen: The Sweet Hereafter
13.plot: Jughead finds himself in an unexpected situation; The truth about Blossoms' family business is revealed, leaving Cheryl to take matters into her own hands.

1.title: Chapter Fourteen: A Kiss Before Dying
1.plot: Fred's life hangs in the balance following the shooting; Veronica's father arrives into town; Jughead and Betty question the gunman's true motives.

2.title: Chapter Fifteen: Nighthawks
2.plot: With the gunman still at large, Betty leads the charge to save Pop's from closing; Jughead's attempt to find FP a new lawyer may have some serious repercussions.

3.title: Chapter Sixteen: The Watcher in the Woods
3.plot: Archie takes matters into his own hands; An unexpected turn of events leads the town to realize their darkest chapter may be far from over.

4.title: Chapter Seventeen: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
4.plot: Betty finds herself at the center of a deepening mystery; Tensions between the North and Southside comes to a head and leads to an unexpected showdown.

5.title: Chapter Eighteen: When a Stranger Calls
5.plot: Betty turns to Archie for help after receiving an ultimatum; Veronica's old friend comes to town, but his plans for a wild night takes an unexpected turn.

6.title: Chapter Nineteen: Death Proof
6.plot: A charge led by Mayor McCoy threatens to further escalate tensions with the Southside; Betty is thrust into a burgeoning mystery surrounding the Sugarman.

7.title: Chapter Twenty: Tales from the Darkside
7.plot: The town remains on edge after a chilling letter from the Black Hood challenges the town's residents to remain sinless for 48 hours, or he'll strike again.

8.title: Chapter Twenty-One: House of the Devil
8.plot: Jughead and Betty organize a welcome home party for FP's release; Archie and Veronica must push their issues aside upon taking over the Black Hood investigation.

9.title: Chapter Twenty-Two: Silent Night, Deadly Night
9.plot: Veronica uncovers a major secret about her father; Betty and Archie's vow to take down the Black Hood once and for all leads to a dangerous showdown.

10.title: Chapter Twenty-Three: The Blackboard Jungle
10.plot: Tensions mount when Jughead and his fellow students from Southside High transfer to Riverdale High; Betty sets out to find her long-lost brother.

11.title: Chapter Twenty-Four: The Wrestler
11.plot: Archie joins the wrestling team to get closer to Hiram; Jughead digs up shocking details about Riverdale's past; Betty unearths some dark secrets about Chic.

12.title: Chapter Twenty-Five: The Wicked and the Divine
12.plot: An act of vandalism stirs up suspicion; Archie's new job as Hiram's intern has Veronica worried he'll learn about the Lodge family secrets.

13.title: Chapter Twenty-Six: The Tell-Tale Heart
13.plot: A hasty decision comes back to haunt Betty; Tensions between Hiram, FP and Jughead spiral out of control; Archie is forced to make a tough decision.

14.title: Chapter Twenty-Seven: The Hills Have Eyes
14.plot: Determined to uncover Hiram's plans, Jughead presses Veronica about what she may know; Cheryl makes a surprising connection with an unlikely friend.

15.title: Chapter Twenty-Eight: There Will Be Blood
15.plot: Fred considers running for Mayor; Betty becomes increasingly suspicious of Chic; Jughead makes a major discovery in his quest to take down Hiram.

16.title: Chapter Twenty-Nine: Primary Colors
16.plot: In the aftermath of Hiram's plans, Jughead resorts to drastic measures to voice his opposition; Tensions between Fred and Archie reach a breaking point.

17.title: Chapter Thirty: The Noose Tightens
17.plot: Hiram's mobster associates come to stir up some trouble; Things take a dangerous turn when an unexpected guest shows up at the Cooper residence.

18.title: Chapter Thirty-One: A Night to Remember
18.plot: As Riverdale High begins rehearsals for Carrie the Musical, the arrival of an ominous letter forces director Kevin to make a difficult decision about the show.

19.title: Chapter Thirty-Two: Prisoners
19.plot: An incident at Riverdale High leaves the town on edge; The reveal of a devastating secret leads to a violent showdown between Chic, Jughead, Betty and Alice.

20.title: Chapter Thirty-Three: Shadow of a Doubt
20.plot: Betty turns to Cheryl for help when she has a suspicion about the Black Hood; A mysterious message leaves everyone on edge.

21.title: Chapter Thirty-Four: Judgment Night
21.plot: An all-out war with the North and the Southside triggers; Veronica makes a devastating discovery; Betty comes face to face with the Black Hood.

22.title: Chapter Thirty-Five: Brave New World
22.plot: Veronica stays one step ahead after uncovering Hiram's latest scheme; FP makes a surprising announcement to Jughead and the Serpents; Betty confronts her darkest demons.

imdb.plot outline: After the death of one of the rich and popular Blossom twins on the 4th of July, the small town of Riverdale investigates the murder. The series starts in September, the beginning of a new school year, that brings with it new students, relationships, and reveals the mysteries of the past 4th of July.
imdb.title: Riverdale
plot: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark _Riverdale_ (qv) mysteries.::vhavnal

After the death of one of the rich and popular Blossom twins on the 4th of July, the small town of _Riverdale_ (qv) investigates the murder. The series starts in September, the beginning of a new school year, that brings with it new students, relationships, and reveals the mysteries of the past 4th of July.::ahmetkozan

The quiet little town of _Riverdale_ (qv) is turned upside down after it is struck with the mysterious death of Jason Blossom, a popular high school student and member of the most powerful family in town. Archie and his friends explore the struggles of everyday life in a small town whilst taking on the haunting case of Jason Blossom. in order to solve this mystery, the rag tag group of friends must first unlock the secrets that lie buried deep beneath surface of their hometown. _Riverdale_ (qv) may not be as innocent as it appears.::ahmetkozan

In an innocent, small town, the death of a popular rich boy named Jason Blossom rattles the town. Archie Andrews discovers his love for music, and his teacher. Betty Cooper unravels her feelings for Archie, and her family secrets. Veronica Lodge is the new girl, who is a threat to cheerleading captain Cheryl Blossom, Jason's twin sister. Archie, Betty, Veronica, and Jughead band together to find the mysteries behind Jason Blossom's murder.::ahmetkozan

After a teenager was murdered within the town of _Riverdale_ (qv), a group of teenagers, the jock Archie, the girl next door Betty, the new girl Veronica and the outcast Jughead try to unravel the evils lurking within this seemingly innocent town.::sollygibbs
